title: Recruiting regular flex team/clash squad
body:
Hey guys recruiting some regulars for flex and to team up. 

Lf gold+ friendly environment to play and learn strategies. 

Add me: Nat the rat or NateyBoi

replies.body:
HI, commited player with tons of experience playing flex keen to join IGN: Señor Melon, smurf IGN: little meion.

Happy to play regularly, listen and improve.

Happy to play every night until late.
